items.name: adamId
items.desc: The adamId used in your campaign. Use Get a Campaign or Get All Campaigns to obtain your adamId.This field is required in requests to Create a Creative.You can use the EQUALS and IN selector Condition operators with Find Creatives.

items.name: creationTime
items.desc: The date and time the object was created. You can use the EQUALS, LESS_THAN, and GREATER_THAN selector Condition operators with Find Creatives.

items.name: id
items.desc: The creativeId is a unique identifier for a creative.You can use the EQUALS and IN selector Condition operators with Find Creatives.

items.name: modificationTime
items.desc: The date and time of the most recent modification of the object.You can use the EQUALS, LESS_THAN, and GREATER_THAN selector Condition operators with Find Creatives.

items.name: name
items.desc: The name of a creative.This field is required in requests to Create a Creative.You can use the EQUALS and CONTAINS selector Condition operators with Find Creatives.

items.name: orgId
items.desc: The identifier of the organization that owns a campaign. Your orgId is the same as your account in the Apple Search Ads UI.

items.name: state
items.desc: The system state of the creative.  See CreativeState for enum descriptions.

items.name: stateReasons
items.desc: The detailed explanation of the system state. See CreativeStateReason for enum descriptions.

items.name: type
items.desc: The type of creative. This field is required in requests to Create a Creative.See CreativeType for enum descriptions.You can assign one active custom product page to the adgroup.You can use the EQUALS and IN selector Condition operators with Find Creatives.
